www_amazon_co_jp.gbgetpricereport: (function(){ var a = doc.querySelector('#priceBlock .priceLarge') || doc.querySelector('#price_feature_div #priceblock_ourprice') || doc.querySelector('#current-price') || doc.querySelector('#priceblock_saleprice') || doc.querySelector('#actualPriceValue'); if(!a)return 0;return a.outerText.trim().replace('￥','').replace(',', '').replace(',','');})()

www_amazon_de.gbgetpricereport: (function(){var a = doc.querySelector('#kitsune-price_feature_div') || doc.querySelector('#priceBlock .priceLarge') || doc.querySelector('#price_feature_div #priceblock_ourprice') || doc.querySelector('#current-price') || doc.querySelector('#priceblock_saleprice') || doc.querySelector('#actualPriceValue'); if(!a)return 0;return a.outerText.trim().replace('EUR','').replace('.','').replace(',', '.');})()

www_amazon_com.gbgetpricereport: (function(){var a = doc.querySelector('#priceblock_dealprice') || doc.querySelector('#priceBlock .priceLarge') || doc.querySelector('#price_feature_div #priceblock_ourprice') || doc.querySelector('#current-price') || doc.querySelector('#priceblock_saleprice') || doc.querySelector('#actualPriceValue') || doc.querySelector('#price_feature_div #price #priceblock_dealprice'); if(!a)return 0;return a.outerText.trim().replace('$', '').replace('EUR','').replace(',', '').trim();})()
